resources.string: The world is infested with the deadly Corona virus. You can get infected even if a person around you is infected. The CDC has recommended keeping a minimum social distance of 6 feet in public places. And use of face covering is mandatory anywhere in public within 6 feet of another person. In this game, you will be helping Hagger tackle infected people to make his way home safely.
Went within 6 ft of an infected person.
